```{r eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE, error=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(magick)
quote_df <- read_csv('quote_df.csv')
quote_num <- sample(1:nrow(quote_df), 1) 
quote <- quote_df$text[quote_num]
ran_num <- sample(1:nrow(selected_photos), 1)
wallpaper <- image_read(selected_photos$medium[ran_num]) %>% image_scale(500) 
if(image_info(wallpaper)[3] > 400){
  wallpaper <- image_crop(wallpaper, '500x400')}
wallpaper <- wallpaper %>% image_annotate(text = quote, font = 'Times', size = 20, gravity = 'center', color = '#222222')
```

`r selected_photos`
